short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gets the name of the color by its hex code

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The purpose if this extension is to get the color name of a color given by its hex code. It also lets the user pick the desired color by using the native Javascript api EyeDropper. 

Colorblind are very welcome to try it. I did it for myself because I didn't find an extension that did the same as this one.
